actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Executive Comment Requested from DOT, OMB.

official_title: A bill to terminate certain authority of the executive branch of the Government which is subject to congressional review unless that authority is approved by an enactment of the Congress.

summary.text: Terminates the authority of the Secretary of Transportation relating to the airline employee protection program under the Airline Deregulation Act of 1978 (formerly subject to congressional veto), unless the exercise of such authority is approved by an enactment of Congress within 180 days after enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to terminate certain authority of the executive branch of the Government which is subject to congressional review unless that authority is approved by an enactment of the Congress.
